label: description
comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

domainIncludes.comment: A significant occurrence or happening during transport.,A referenced significant occurrence or happening during transport.
A service associated with a transport movement.,A referenced service associated with a specified event during transport movement.

A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.,A referenced self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes.
A charge made for a logistics related service.
Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
An unused and rejected as unwanted component of transport material resulting from transportation.
Handling information of an instructive nature.
Sanitary measures as reported for a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).
Information related to a specific transportation indication to be reported on a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).
The information relevant to a condition or a position related to logistics.
A logistics related physical location or place.
A way or course taken from one location to another for the purpose of transporting cargo and or passengers.
Instructions related to the action or process of conveyance.
Packaging information of an instructive nature.
A stores item, such as for onboard use during a journey.
A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances resulting from transportation.
The identification of related information in a supply chain context.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
Conditions agreed upon between the parties with regard to the delivery of goods and or services for trade purposes.
Delivery information of an instructive nature.
